short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Desk Yogi every day keeps desk butt away! This app reminds you to get up and move throughout the workday.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take a break that matters and begin to build a wellness habit in as little as 3 minutes without leaving your desk. Enjoy a healthier and more productive work day whenever you need it.

Desk Yogi membership not required but highly recommended. 

The Desk Yogi Reminder App is simple to use. You can:

- Set multiple reminders for specific times. 
- Choose to be reminded only on certain days of the week.
- Setup interval reminders that only notify during work hours.
- Create one-time or repeat reminders.
- Turn on/off sound.
- Snooze a reminder.
- Link directly to Desk Yogi videos.

Desk Yogi delivers expert fitness training, stress reduction and mindfulness videos designed specifically for office life. 

Visit http://desk-yogi.com to join and turn your work station into a wellness station!
